content: [TextBlock(text="TEST [2025, Age 22] The cherry blossoms in Tokyo were a reminder that beauty and technology can coexist harmoniously. Now back in NYC, I'm integrating that lesson into our VR project, aiming to blend the real with the virtual in ways that enhance human connection.", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="TEST [2025, Age 22] So I tried to code an AR filter for our VR project, ended up with a digital mustache on every user's avatar. Laughed it off with Lina, but it got us thinking about the balance between tech and human touch. Here's to a year of making technology more human, not the other way around.", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="TEST [2025, Age 22] Cooking dinner tonight, I realized that just like in tech, the best results come from blending the right ingredients in the right way. As I sautéed the veggies, I thought about how our VR project could use a dash of real-world human connection to truly stand out. Maybe it's time to collaborate with a local artist or chef, to infuse our digital spaces with tangible human experiences. Here's to enriching our virtual worlds with a touch of reality.", type='text')]
